A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can see why some people may have mixed views on this. I left the cinema in a daze before it started to settle and found myself coming down on the 'that was really good' side. From the first scene on I knew it was not going to just rehash the past films but reset and renew. For those who worship the old films this change is unsettling - I found it invigorating and I'm more eager to see the next one.
